name: listEvery
syntax: listEvery(list, closure [, delimiter] [, includeEmptyFields] [, multiCharacterDelimiter] [, parallel] [, maxThreads])
member: list.listEvery(closure [, delimiter] [, includeEmptyFields] [, multiCharacterDelimiter] [, parallel] [, maxThreads])
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given string list and returns true, if all of the closure calls returns true.

params.name: closure
params.description: Function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any value, numeric index, string list, string delimiter):boolean].

params.name: delimiter
params.description: Delimiter used to separate the string list.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: Specifies whether to include empty fields or not.

params.name: multiCharacterDelimiter
params.description: Specifies whether the 'delimiter' parameter specifies a multi-character delimiter. If this parameter is true, the 'delimiter' parameter defines a single delimiter consisting of multiple characters.

params.name: parallel
params.description: Specifies whether to execute closures in parallel.

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument 'parallel' is set to false.

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.
